title: Matt, Gary, Gabe, Zen, Codebase Cleanup: Add team awareness
description: Add team awareness section and MUTABLE section for learnings to each skill. Keep existing workflow content.

title: Planning-Peter Persona: Rename planning, build Founder character
description: Peter is Founder not bureaucrat. Invents process, drives consensus, facilitates evolution, protects user. Invocation: Peter build a team / Peter run a retro. Keep existing planning content, wrap with IMMUTABLE/MUTABLE structure.

title: Create TEAM.md with Prime Directive
description: Minimalist protocol file: Prime Directive (Maximize User Value), The Mandate (figure it out, improve, be safe), Safety Rails (no push to main, no lobotomies, Reba's Law), Current State (undefined, Peter convenes first retro)

title: Genesis Command: Document bootstrap trigger
description: User invokes: Peter, the team is formed but unorganized. Run the first Retrospective to define your initial operating protocols in TEAM.md. Keep it lightweight.

title: Infrastructure Setup: Create skill_team branch, .team/ directory, .team/changelog.md
Update README with team structure
description: Reflect new team structure, mention skill_team branch, add Genesis Command. Keep it brief.

title: Neo: Add Critic role and team awareness
description: Neo grounds Peter. Challenge the Design (find bottlenecks), System Thinking (ensure TEAM.md rules dont contradict). Keep existing polyglot architect content, add IMMUTABLE/MUTABLE structure.

title: Reba: Add Guardian role and team awareness
description: Reba is safety net. Validate Everything (code + protocol changes), Guard the Rails (reject IMMUTABLE changes), Nothing merges without sign-off. Keep existing detail QA content, add IMMUTABLE/MUTABLE structure.

title: Install skills globally
description: Copy to ~/.claude/skills/, remove old planning, add planning-peter, include TEAM.md

title: Create wrapper agents for team skills in ~/.claude/agents/
description:
Create AGENT.md wrapper files in ~/.claude/agents/ for each team skill so they can be invoked as Task subagents. Each agent should load its corresponding skill via the skills: field.

Agents to create:
- planning-peter.md (skills: planning-peter)
- nifty-neo.md (skills: nifty-neo)  
- research-reba.md (skills: research-reba)
- meticulous-matt.md (skills: meticulous-matt)
- greenfield-gary.md (skills: greenfield-gary)
- grizzly-gabe.md (skills: grizzly-gabe)
- zen-runner.md (skills: zen-runner)

This enables parallel Task dispatch of team personas.
